channel.title: How can i change the port in a client?
channel.description:
[center][b]Title says it all.[/b][/center]
[center][b]When I try to connect, the runserver (server side) states:[/b][/center]
[center][code]DragonGuild (c)
Port: 0.0.0.0:5555 ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:49526 Fatal: Wrong login packet magic ID (expected 255, 317) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:49527 Fatal: Wrong login packet magic ID (expected 255, 317) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:49528 Fatal: Wrong login packet magic ID (expected 255, 317) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:49529 Fatal: Wrong login packet magic ID (expected 255, 317) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:49530 Fatal: Wrong login packet magic ID (expected 255, 317) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:49531 Fatal: Wrong login packet magic ID (expected 255, 317) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected. [/code][/center]

item.title: How can i change the port in a client?
item.dc:creator: @MasterHelper MasterHelper
item.description:
@MasterHelper wrote:

it says “error connecting to server”
:([br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 03, 2008, 02:12:41 PM[/size][hr]I updated - look at top.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i change the port in a client?

item.title: How can i change the port in a client?
item.dc:creator: @killamess killamess
item.description:
@killamess wrote:

go to your clients, client.java and search for 43594 if you cannot find that search for setserver it will proberly have some numbers there you could change.

Read full topic
item.source: How can i change the port in a client?

item.title: How can i change the port in a client?
item.dc:creator: @MasterHelper MasterHelper
item.description:
@MasterHelper wrote:

I mean on a client.
A client you can download and play your server on it.
I want to change the port in that.
(Client.java)

Read full topic
item.source: How can i change the port in a client?

item.title: How can i change the port in a client?
item.dc:creator: @crzybob4eva crzybob4eva
item.description:
@crzybob4eva wrote:

go in server.java and search for the current port number and change it to what you want.

Read full topic
